pluggable.name: GeoLocations Mashup
pluggable.author: Ryan Mullins
pluggable.description: Adds Google maps mashup of Geolocation enabled content.

help.name: _help
help.value:
This plugin adds a Google Map mashup of the Geolocation enabled content on your site.

This plugin highly recommends the GeoLocations plugin which enables the correct information for you content.

Without the information, this plugin will simply display a google map.
